meaningMnemonic: If you go to <kanji>attire</kanji> yourself, you're covering up who you are and trying to be someone else. You are trying <vocabulary>to feign</vocabulary>. You are trying <vocabulary>to wear</vocabulary> a lie. You are trying <vocabulary>to pretend</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: While you go <vocabulary>to feign</vocabulary> that you're someone or something else, someone calls you out on it: "<reading>you so</reading> (よそお) much a liar!"
